name: VMI_Model
description: VMI model : OPT profit for VMI

scripts.api: sam local start-api -t template.yaml --docker-network host --env-vars env.json
scripts.package: sam package --region us-east-1 --profile Law --debug --s3-bucket aws-vmi-nash-ga --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy: sam deploy -g --profile Law --template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket aws-vmi-nash-ga --stack-name vmi-check-opt
